description:
Leo Mycenae thinks back to the time of Mars rise to power as he fights against two losing bronze.  Mycenae’s determination wavers as Eden comes to terms to what he must do.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kedakaki Pride! Mycenae, Ouja no Kobushi!
La loyauté avant tout. Mycène, le poing d`un roi !
Noble Pride! Mycenae, Fist of the King!
気高きプライド! ミケーネ, 王者の拳!
